repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: Mary Seaman Collection of Arlington Mills Photographs
did.abstract: Photographs of the 1946 Christmas Party at Arlington Mills in Lawrence, Massachusetts.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Inccludes en snapshots of a Christmas Party at Arlington Mills, in Lawrence, Massachusetts. This party most likely took place in 1946. Pictured are groups of employees, Santa Claus, Christmas decorations, and mill machinery.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Mary Seaman Collection of Arlington Mills Photographs #6771 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 6517: Arlington Mills Records 6517 G: Arlington Mills Graphics 6517 GPN: Arlington Mills Glass Plate Negatives 6517 P: Arlington Mills Photographs 6517 PUBS: Arlington Mills Publications

did.unittitle: Item 1: Female employees at Christmas party

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Female employees at Christmas party, Arlington Mills, Lawrence, Mass. Gelatin silver print snapshot. Image depicts several female employees of the Arlington Mills (Mill 28) in Lawrence, Mass., at a Christmas party, probably in 1946. They are sitting at a table on which are several bottles of wine or champagne (?). "Merry Xmas" sign on pole in background. 9 x 9 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 2: Employees with Santa Claus at Christmas party

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Employees with Santa Claus at Christmas party, Arlington Mills, Lawrence, Mass. Gelatin silver print snapshot. Image depicts several employees of the Arlington Mills (Mill 28) in Lawrence, Mass., seated at a table with Santa Claus in the background at a Christmas party, probably in 1946. 9 x 9 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 3: Employees with Santa Claus at Christmas party

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Employees with Santa Claus at Christmas party, Arlington Mills, Lawrence, Mass. Gelatin silver print snapshot. Image depicts several employees of the Arlington Mills (Mill 28) in Lawrence, Mass., in a group portrait with Santa Claus seated in the center. Tinsel hangs between poles in the background; Christmas party, probably in 1946. 9 x 9 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 4: Female employees at Christmas party

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Female employees at Christmas party, Arlington Mills, Lawrence, Mass. Gelatin silver print snapshot. Image depicts a group of female employees posed together at a Christmas party, probably in 1946, in the Arlington Mills (Mill 28) in Lawrence, Mass. One woman holds a 'Merry Xmas" sign; two others hold a partially obscured sign that reads, in part, "Holiday.." 9 x 9 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 5: Male employee with Santa Claus at Christmas party

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Male employee with Santa Claus at Christmas party, Arlington Mills, Lawrence, Mass. Gelatin silver print snapshot. Image depicts a male employee of the Arlington Mills (Mill 28) in Lawrence, Mass., with Santa Claus at a Christmas party, probably in 1946. Tinsel hangs in the background. 9 x 9 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 6: Female employees at table at Christmas party

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Female employees at table at Christmas party, Arlington Mills, Lawrence, Mass. Gelatin silver print snapshot. Image depicts several female employees of the Arlington Mills (Mill 28) in Lawrence, Mass., at a table at a Christmas party, probably in 1946. The table is loaded with plates of food and cups. 9 x 9 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Christmas party, spinning room, Arlington Mills, Lawrence, Mass. Gelatin silver print snapshot. Image depicts a table in the spinning room of the Arlington Mills (Mill 28) in Lawrence, Mass., at a Christmas party, probably in 1946. Several female employees are sitting at the table; one male and two female employees stand behind it. Creels and spinning machinery visible in background. 9 x 9 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 8: Santa Claus at Christmas party

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Santa Claus at Christmas party, Arlington Mills, Lawrence, Mass. Gelatin silver print snapshot. Image depicts Santa Claus at a Christmas party in the Arlington Mills (Mill 28) in Lawrence, Mass., probably in 1946. The backs of several employees are visible on the right. tinsel is strung between two poles. 9 x 9 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 9: Santa Claus with male employee at Christmas party

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Santa Claus with male employee at Christmas party, Arlington Mills, Lawrence, Mass. Gelatin silver print snapshot. Image depicts Santa Claus seated on the knee of a male employee at a Christmas party in the Arlington Mills (Mill 28) in Lawrence, Mass., probably in 1946. Creels and spinning machinery visible in background. 9 x 9 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 10: Female employees at Christmas party

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Female employees at Christmas party, Arlington Mills, Lawrence, Mass. Gelatin silver print snapshot. Image depicts a group of female employees posed together at a Christmas party in the Arlington Mills (Mill 28) in Lawrence, Mass., probably in 1946. 9 x 9 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.
